author: Christine Allaine B. Dumaplin
title: | mb.com.ph | Philippine News
text:
by Christine Allaine B. Dumaplin
October 23, 2015 Kim Chiu
Kim Chiu bagged three awards from the 2nd Star Cinema Online Awards including Favorite Social Media Celebrity, Favorite Album (“Chinita Princess”) and Favorite Song (“Mr. Right”).
The Kapamilya actress-recording artist expressed her gratitude on Instagram. “Thank You Star Cinema Awards for nominating me in these categories; and of course hindi ko makukuha lahat ’to kung hindi dahil sa mga taong walang pagod na sumuporta and bumoto para sa ’kin!!! Sa inyong lahat, maraming maraming salamat!!! Love you all!!” she wrote.
It was a close fight between Kim and Darren Espanto in the Favorite Social Media Celebrity category. He got 41.56 percent of online votes against Kim’s 54.2 percent. Their other co-nominees in the category were Enrique Gil, Maria Sofia Love, Maris Racal, Alex Gonzaga, Jane Oineza, Nadine Lustre, Kathryn Bernardo and Loisa Andalio.
Note that Kim has 2.2 million followers on Instagram and 853,000 followers on Twitter.
Kim’s song “Mr. Right” from “Chinita Princess” album won Favorite Song, outshining Alex Gonzaga (“Panaginip Lang”) Maris Racal (“Tanong Mo Sa Bituin”), Daryl Ong (“Ikaw Na Nga”), Kathryn Bernardo (“You Don’t Know Me”), Janella Salvador (“Tick Tock Love”), Morissette Amon (“’Di Mapaliwanag”), Janella Salvador and Marlo Mortel (“Kapag Tumibok Ang Puso”), Liza Soberano (“With You In My Life”) and Bailey May and Ylona Garcia (“Magmahal Muli”).
For Favorite Album award, “Chinita Princess” triumphed over Daniel Padilla’s “I Feel Good;” Alex Gonzaga’s “I Am Alex G;” Jed Madela’s “Iconic;” Yeng Constantino’s “All About Love;” Jovit Baldovino’s “Jukebox” and eponymous albums of Morissette Amon, Daryl Ong and Enchong Dee and Janella Salvador.
Last year, Kim bagged the Favorite Female Movie Star, while her onscreen partner Xian Lim was the Favorite Male Movie Star. The two known as KimXi (Kim and Xian) became the Favorite Love Team then.
